verses.verse: <S%G1437>If<s%> I <S%G2980>speak<s%> with the <S%G1100>languages<s%> of <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G32>angels,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G3361>don't<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G26>love,<s%> I have <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G2278>sounding<s%> <S%G5475>brass,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> a <S%G214>clanging<s%> <S%G2950>cymbal.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G1437>If<s%> I <S%G2192>have<s%> the gift of <S%G4394>prophecy,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3466>mysteries<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1108>knowledge;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> I <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4102>faith,<s%> so <S%G5620>as<s%> to <S%G3179>remove<s%> <S%G3735>mountains,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G3361>don't<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G26>love,<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G3762>nothing.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G1437>If<s%> I <S%G5595>dole<s%> out <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G5224>goods<s%> to <S%G5595>feed<s%> the <S%G2532>poor,<s%> and <S%G1437>if<s%> I <S%G3860>give<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4983>body<s%> <S%G2443>to<s%> be <S%G2545>burned,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G3361>don't<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G26>love,<s%> it <S%G5623>profits<s%> me <S%G3762>nothing.<s%>

<S%G26>Love<s%> <S%G3763>never<s%> <S%G1601>fails.<s%> <S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G1535>where<s%> there are <S%G4394>prophecies,<s%> they will be done <S%G2673>away<s%> <S%G1535>with.<s%> Where there are various <S%G1100>languages,<s%> they will <S%G3973>cease.<s%> <S%G1535>Where<s%> there is <S%G1108>knowledge,<s%> it will be done away <S%G2673>with.<s%>

<S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> that which <S%G3588>is<s%> <S%G5046>complete<s%> has <S%G2064>come,<s%> <S%G5119>then<s%> that which <S%G3588>is<s%> <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3313>partial<s%> will be done away <S%G2673>with.<s%>

<S%G3753>When<s%> I <S%G2252>was<s%> a <S%G3516>child,<s%> I <S%G2980>spoke<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> a <S%G3516>child,<s%> I <S%G5426>felt<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> a <S%G3516>child,<s%> I <S%G3049>thought<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> a <S%G3516>child.<s%> <S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G3753>that<s%> I have <S%G1096>become<s%> a <S%G435>man,<s%> I have put <S%G2673>away<s%> <S%G3516>childish<s%> <S%G3588>things.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G737>now<s%> we <S%G991>see<s%> <S%G1223>in<s%> a <S%G1722>mirror,<s%> <S%G135>dimly,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G5119>then<s%> <S%G4383>face<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G4383>face.<s%> <S%G737>Now<s%> I <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G1537>in<s%> <S%G3313>part,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G5119>then<s%> I will <S%G1921>know<s%> <S%G2531>fully,<s%> even as I was <S%G2532>also<s%> fully <S%G1921>known.<s%>
